content: We can add messages regarding the RDA HPSS-evacuation to this topic thread
Tapes are unmounted under /DRDATA/DECS at the moment. We still need some tapes to be mounted manually to recover about 900 files that are backups of files on bad tapes.

Wed Mar 18 16:00:08 MDT 2020 /glade/collections/rda/decsdata 514.54 TB 1500.00 TB 34.30 % 1656086
That is about of 60% of total HPSS files need to be transferred to decsdata
